Improvements.Description: The constructor is doing too many things which makes it hard to understand and maintain. It would be better to split the constructor into smaller methods, each doing one thing. This will make it easier to understand what the constructor is doing and to maintain the code.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- if (this.server != null) {
+ if (this.server == null) { throw new RuntimeException("Server cannot be null"); }
Improvements.Description: There is a possibility that the 'MockBukkit.getMock()' method could return null. It would be better to add a null check for server and throw an exception if it is null. This would prevent NullPointerExceptions from occurring later in the code.
